entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
